title: Toyota 1500lb Electric Forklift
item_description:
Toyota 1500lb Electric Forklift

Note: Forklift has been reserved by the Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on Tuesday, October 15th, 2024 at 3:30 pm. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.

  • Manufacturer: Toyota
  • Model: 5FBCU18
  • Load Capacity: 1,500 lb
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 18,778
  • Serial Number: 62668
  • Truck Weight: 7,700 lb
  • Tread Width: 6”
  • Tire Type: Cushion
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 21x7x15
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 16x5x10-1/2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 189”
  • Fork Length: 42”
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Features: Side Shift Tilt
